alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 1:00PM PDT until October 26 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 9 inches. * WHERE...Stevens Pass on Highway 2 and Washington Pass on Highway 20. * WHEN...Late this afternoon, through the night until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel through the mountain passes will be challenging. Prepare for winter driving conditions at high elevations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Washington state can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
